job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Title                                       : Site Reliability EngineerLocation                              : Cary, NCDuration                            : 12+ MonthsRate                                      : OPEN                            Visa Status                         : ANY In-Person Interview      : NoRelevant Experience (in Yrs.)  : 8+ Detailed Job Description:8 Years E2E Technical Leadership - Reliability - Cloud, Monitoring, JAVA,Site Reliability, Monitoring, dev solutionsExpertise in various types of monitoringfamiliarity with monitoring solutions for multi app, multi cloud platform, knowledge of APICA, SPLUNK, and home grown monitoring for batch, API, and distributed applicationsExpertise in devops practices & automation of deployments, monitoring, batch processesAbility to identify problems in current platform, propose and drive solutions through breadth of experiencehelp diagnose and RCA production incidentsThanks And RegardsArun Kumar Reddy Technical Recruiter Ascii Group LLC Email: rec32@asciigroup.com Phone: (248) 476-7600 Ext 107 | (430) 260-3565
